trends: There have been no other sightings in Buffalo
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details I am a med nurse in Fort Erie ,Ontario. I got to work at 5;45 this morning , when the laundry girl Linda I work with said the object was in the sky. We have been observing it for some weeks now, we immediately went out side and I recorded it on my cell phone like I have some several times before. Only this time I had at least 5 witnesses, I ve been showing my video for some time but this time I have a clear picture of the moon and cars driving under neath it the lights actually flash in sequence while the objuct sits motionless in the sky. Iam not attaching clips if you want to see the video you come to me. Where I know there safe.
Summary: Its been hanging around for days its 6 or 7 lights white lights with red flashing lights it hovers
